messages: e6d9fd07db083a32ebc3b9d749bb3ac5 (15:56): afternoon
58869a2e5c3f0eab9aa398b0a798e354 (15:57): Snowy afternoon, more specifically :)
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (15:58): morning you two
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (15:58): agreeing with the snow part
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (15:59): damn it, now i have the Indiana Jones theme song stuck in my head
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (15:59): it's just rattling around up there in all the empty space
e6d9fd07db083a32ebc3b9d749bb3ac5 (16:08): hahaha
e6d9fd07db083a32ebc3b9d749bb3ac5 (16:09): I loved that we recorded the "copyleft" version by dragging random colleagues into a meeting room
e6d9fd07db083a32ebc3b9d749bb3ac5 (16:09): The atmosphere in the Mozilla office rocks
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (16:10): you didn't abduct them Jones style? Hide behind a crate, grab them, beat them up a little bit and then stand them up making them sing?

e6d9fd07db083a32ebc3b9d749bb3ac5 (16:10): In case there is confusion, we're talking about the HTML5 video and map syncing demo: http://hacks.mozilla.org/2010/12/spirit-of-indiana-jones-syncing-html5-video-with-maps/
58869a2e5c3f0eab9aa398b0a798e354 (16:10): Are you in Paris, e6d9fd07db083a32ebc3b9d749bb3ac5?
e6d9fd07db083a32ebc3b9d749bb3ac5 (16:10): I am in Mountain View
58869a2e5c3f0eab9aa398b0a798e354 (16:10): Heh, then it's far from afternoon for you
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (16:10): i bet it's his internal clock speaking
e6d9fd07db083a32ebc3b9d749bb3ac5 (16:10): yeah my laptop is still London time
e6d9fd07db083a32ebc3b9d749bb3ac5 (16:10): and I am flying back on Sunday
58869a2e5c3f0eab9aa398b0a798e354 (16:11): I figured London indeed, hence my snowy afternoon remark
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (16:11): extracts the Indiana Jones theme from his head with the help of the score to Harry Potter and the Prizoner of Azkaban
e6d9fd07db083a32ebc3b9d749bb3ac5 (16:12): duh duh duh duh dah dah dah duh duh duh duuuuuuh da da da daaa daaa da...
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (16:13): just out of curiousity, did you ever check out that pdf I DMed you e6d9fd07db083a32ebc3b9d749bb3ac5 ?
e6d9fd07db083a32ebc3b9d749bb3ac5 (16:13): I did but it was long
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (16:14): i know....16 pages *nods*
e6d9fd07db083a32ebc3b9d749bb3ac5 (16:14): I have back to back meetings right now - Filed it in my "on the plane" folder
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (16:14): perfect time to, especially if people sitting near you wonder what's so funny
be51bd0bf909e7c2ce4328e2f9bb04b4 (16:19): <link rel="stylesheet" <- this is not necessary anymore right in HTML5?
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (16:22): <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css">
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (16:22): all you need i believe
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (16:22): no more type="text/css"
be51bd0bf909e7c2ce4328e2f9bb04b4 (16:22): thanks

528cb0f5b5fab32225138acf8a2e9a6f (16:34): HI I am adapting my portfolio to use CSS3 Media queries, everything works fine, except the css3 transitions.  I specified that the transition should only work for the box shadow property    "transition-property: box-shadow;", but when the css3 media query is executed after resizing the browser the the height and width are also animated.  This is the website
528cb0f5b5fab32225138acf8a2e9a6f (16:34): http:/ 528cb0f5b5fab32225138acf8a2e9a6f.com/portfolio
528cb0f5b5fab32225138acf8a2e9a6f (16:35): any idea what I am doing wrong? This happens on chrome 8.0.555
528cb0f5b5fab32225138acf8a2e9a6f (16:37): I think is probably the change of the float property from "left" to "none" that is causing the problem. Any suggestion?
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (16:39): couldn't tell ya myself
4d05dc3c4352ebe7593b536f2078cfe9 (16:41): 528cb0f5b5fab32225138acf8a2e9a6f: looks like a Chrome bug
528cb0f5b5fab32225138acf8a2e9a6f (16:42): 0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17, 4d05dc3c4352ebe7593b536f2078cfe9 , that what I was thinking. anyone of you use safary?
4d05dc3c4352ebe7593b536f2078cfe9 (16:42): 528cb0f5b5fab32225138acf8a2e9a6f: I've tested in Safari and Firefox4, no bug
528cb0f5b5fab32225138acf8a2e9a6f (16:43): 4d05dc3c4352ebe7593b536f2078cfe9, ok, great, them I am not going to worry that much.
4d05dc3c4352ebe7593b536f2078cfe9 (16:44): 528cb0f5b5fab32225138acf8a2e9a6f: you can use the shortcut transition: box-shadow 0.5s ease;
4d05dc3c4352ebe7593b536f2078cfe9 (16:44): (with the -moz, -webkit and -o prefixes)
4d05dc3c4352ebe7593b536f2078cfe9 (16:44): Opera supports transitions too
4d05dc3c4352ebe7593b536f2078cfe9 (16:44): https://developer.mozilla.org/en/CSS/-moz-transition for the syntax of the shortcut
528cb0f5b5fab32225138acf8a2e9a6f (16:45): 4d05dc3c4352ebe7593b536f2078cfe9, great, that will clean up the code a lot!
